pages.text: Flight is commonly understood to be incredibly helpful for a variety of tasks, from travel to construction. Many known methods of flight have significant drawbacks, such as limited airtime, high cost, or lack of fine control. Swiftwolf set out to change that.$(br)By using the power of interdiction torches, combined with the weight of an anvil, this powerful ring allows the user to fly, consuming fuel

items from the inventory to do so. Additionally, pressing the 'Fire Projectile' key while holding the ring will (at a very high cost) shoot a projectile that will strike lightning, and pressing the 'Change Mode' key will make it repel nearby entities.
